name: Fated Souls
description:
Description
Formerly known as Dark Souls, Fated Souls is Warfare Studios' first commercial release, and one of their most popular along with Vagrant Hearts, Ashes of Immortality and Valiant.
Note: to toggle between screen modes, press ALT + ENTER. Storyline
You are haunted by your mercenary past and seeking peace. You are talked into taking what you believe is a simple job as a bodyguard for an introverted girl with divine power. Soon however, you find yourself thrust into events beyond your control on a global scale, and must use your wits and skills to survive. Best-selling Games by Aldorlea Available on Steam
